name: Greg Hastings' Tournament Paintball Max'd
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)

He shoots, he splats, he scores.



Greg Hasting's Tournament Paintball Max'd is based on a 1st-person perspective. Pick a character, select your Paintgun Marker and jersey, and start a career to accumulate points and gain experience in Single-Player mode.

Features

•Engage opponents in ultra-intense paintball action in first person mode!•Snap, crouch, strafe, run, and change hands for the fastest action ever!•12 styles of playing fields with 48 total variations!•Selectable difficulty levels as you advance from rookie to amateur to pro!!
